meanings.definition: To increase in value or quality.
meanings.sent1: Regular exercise improves your physical strength.
meanings.sent2: Adding fresh herbs improves the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent3: Putting a bow on a rock won't improve its value, but it might make it look like a present.
meanings.sent4: Kindness improves relationships like magic dust that makes everything sparkle.
meanings.sent5: A coat of paint improves the appearance of a room like a new coat makes you feel stylish.
